sentences.english: Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 顯示所有關於這個主題的文章。

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕顯示，人機對話，圖形顯示界面。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕顯示，人機對話，圖形顯示界面。

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過在基諾樣式板中顯示選擇結果來改進腳本。

sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截圖的右面顯示了一個任務表示的示例。

sentences.english: The results showed that the reflectivities varied during the wound healing process.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示激光照射劑量對傷口組織的反射率影響不大。

sentences.english: Set the debug option to enable a backtrace when a; problem occurs.
sentences.chinese: 當有問題出現顯示錯誤信息，便於調試。

sentences.english: You can choose the mode from the Oculus Configuration Utility's Rift Display Mode screen.
sentences.chinese: 你可以選擇應用程序的屏幕顯示模式。

sentences.english: Weights shown for ball valve figures are PVC threaded models.
sentences.chinese: 表中所顯示的重量適用於PVC螺紋連接的球閥。

sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 現在我在20英寸的液晶顯示器上發電子郵件。

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像顯示額顳葉放射性攝取減低。

sentences.english: Her face told that she was quited satisfied with the result.
sentences.chinese: 她臉上顯示出她對結果很滿意。

sentences.english: The experiment of acute poisonousness showed it was non-poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 急性毒性實驗顯示其無毒。

sentences.english: A handy cam icon is displayed on slides generated using FMR.
sentences.chinese: 使用FMR產生的幻燈片，會顯示手持攝像機圖標。

sentences.english: By using big VOXEL, the color or texture of a volume is rendered.
sentences.chinese: 通過大體素可顯示體的顏色與材質等屬性。

definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
